headline: Jim Cramer on BlackRock: “I Want to Buy That Stock Right Here, Right Now”
summary: BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE:BLK) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer offered insights on. When a caller mentioned that they hold the stock but it has gone down recently, Cramer replied: “Okay, BlackRock, I think that BlackRock’s pretty good now. It did have a dip here, and I like it. I’m going to throw in Blackstone. […]

headline: Avalara Announces $500 Million Investment Led by BlackRock
summary: Avalara, Inc., the agentic tax and compliance leader, today announced it has closed an equity investment from an investor group led by BlackRock's Private Financing Solutions. Vista Equity Partners ("Vista"), which first invested in Avalara in 2022, will remain the company's majority shareholder. All of the proceeds will be used to purchase shares from existing shareholders.

headline: Behind Schwab’s $660M Deal for Private Asset Marketplace Forge
summary: Investors have bought and sold more than $17 billion in private company shares using the platform.

headline: BlackRock Says Buy on Dips, Not Worried About a Pop
summary: Helen Jewell, CIO of fundamental equities at BlackRock, discusses the pullback in equities and says the artificial intelligence trade is still intact. "It is a building block of any portfolio at the moment," Jewell says on Bloomberg Television.

headline: Does BlackRock's (BLK) Pause on Impact Fund Reveal a Shift in Risk Management Strategy?
summary: Earlier this month, BlackRock began winding down its Impact Opportunities Fund following the collapse of portfolio investment Tricolor, pausing some social impact strategies to reassess risk. This recalibration comes as BlackRock’s broad diversification and financial strength allow it to adjust specific investment initiatives without impacting core operations. We'll examine how this pause in social impact investing shapes BlackRock's broader investment narrative and future approach to risk...
